parameters._comment_Channels_: Which encoder channel to setup this is a bit mask, lsb is Ch0
parameters._comment_VideoFormat_: For a list of video formats use -l option
parameters._comment_StreamType_: Valid streamtypes are Standard and Non-elsm
parameters._comment_CodeBlockSize_: For a list of code block sizes use -c option
parameters._comment_Pids_: Various pids for the streams (video, audio, pcr, program)
